Text: When did you guys get engaged?!""
A red Range Rover pulled up and Daxton opened the door
Well you try being pregnant and bending over at the same time."" I grumbled.
You're not going home."" I frowned.
Where are we going then?"" I asked
To see my parents."" My eyes shot open.
We have to announce our engagement to them and that you're....pregnant
If we want to keep our good names
But if we have to keep this up

I ignored him for the rest of the ride to his parents house. How dare he say we have to get married without my consent. I was furious with him that I didn't even look at him. I ignored everything he asked me
When we pulled up to the driveway
Whatever."" I went to open my door
Don't even think about it."" He said
Are you crazy? I'll never be ready to mingle with your parents."" He cracked a smile at my statement before going back to his stoic stance.
Come on."" He grabbed my hand and tingles went up my spine. I have got to get back control of my body because these reactions are not okay. It's the hormones
We walked to the front door of the large house and rang the doorbell. Nervousness shot through me and the worse thoughts crossed my mind.
64694;"*prsmkdwn-i*He's older now */prsmkdwn-i* and when he looks at me he wants answers.
I look up at him now. He's taller. He's handsome and I hate you more when I look at him. But he has your eyes and they break me.
I let him hug me and I hold him. Tighter now. Because he isn't mine anymore. He looks at me because I hold the answers to you
There is blame in his eyes
And I regret that I did not die with you
When his eyes look down on mine.
And I go through the motions. *prsmkdwn-i*She was sick. She loved you*/prsmkdwn-i* and I pray all the while for a moment of truth.
Where i can look my lil man in the eyes and tell him just what a selfish cunt you were."
Mr. and Mrs. King stood in the doorway and immediately smiled when they saw Daxton. Daxton looked exactly like his father
Daxton! What a surprise!"" His mother exclaimed
Are you guys going to invite us in? Ari can't stand on her feet too long."" I thanked Daxton with my eyes
While Mrs. King went to get the food
He sure is. He seemed to be working even harder
Of course."" I answered and he smiled at me. I smiled back and looked up when Daxton's mom came back in with a tray of drinks.
Here you are."" She set down the drinks in front of us and they all proceeded to drink. But I looked at my drink and immediately knew it was alcohol. Mrs. King looked at me over her glass
I frowned at her. Was she serious? ""I'm pregnant. I can't drink."" I ground out
We're here to tell you guys about my pregnancy."" I stated. She coughed in her napkin
Preposterous! Daxton would never knock up some..some low-life."" My mouth hung open at her insult.
Mother!"" Daxton yelled and she turned to him.
It's a boy."" Was all he said.
Did I forget to mention that we're engaged?"" I butt in
Don't what? Tell her the truth? She was going to find out sooner or later."" I argued.
How dare you trick my son into marrying you
Denise!"" Mr. King grabbed his wife and pulled her away from me
Let you handle it? She would've taken it just as hard if you had told her."" Daxton shook his head and stood up.
Are you telling me this is my fault? You think I wanted your crazy ass mother attacking me like some animal?!"" I yelled. Daxton just stared at me
All I'm saying is that you had it coming for you
You wouldn't."" He said darkly. I stepped up to him
Try me."" Footsteps sounded behind Dax and I looked behind his shoulder to see Mr. King coming back. He seemed stressed as he ran his fingers through his hair repeatedly
Thank you."" I smiled at him before looking at Dax. We'll see about that. ""I'm ready to leave."" With that
I slipped into the vehicle and didn't look at Daxton when he slid in next to me.
Ari-"" I held up my hand to shush him
We need to talk later."" He said. I ignored him and unlocked the door
A scream slipped through my lips and I shut my eyes immediately. Rayna and Marco scrambled to cover themselves
64697;"""Ari! You weren't supposed to be here yet."" Rayna picked up Marco's shirt and threw it over her

It just happened? Is that what you're gonna say to Sam when you tell him that you cheated on him with Marc?"" She flinched at my words and I turned my head to Marco. ""What about you? What do you have to say for yourself?""
He shifted uncomfortably as he explained that him and Rayna have had feelings for each other for years

You need to tell Sam."" I pointed to Ray. ""And you.."" I swung my finger to Marco. ""...I don't really know what you should do. Just....wait till Ray breaks up with Sam before banging my friend...again."" He cracked a smile.
Anything for my favorite pregnant lady."" He kissed my cheek and I swatted him away.
Are you mad at me?"" Rayna asked quietly
Of course not. It's your life to live
She pouted her lips. ""I just.....don't feel anything for Sam anymore. He's been into a lot of illegal stuff
You need to break it off with him
That's what best friends are for. Now go buy me some sushi. Daxton's mom went all bat-shit crazy on me earlier
Aye aye captain."" She saluted and grabbed her keys before taking off to the sushi place. When she came back
She tried to make you drink wine? That bitch! I should've been there."" She said with her mouth full of food. I chuckled and shook my head. After eating
I had a few texts from my job
We need to talk. Meet me at the office in 10.
Here to see Mr. King?"" I nodded and she walked me to the elevator like she did the first time I met her. I frowned to myself. I was not totally helpless just because I was pregnant. Like before
I sighed with relief when floor thirty appeared. Walking off
In the secret office was a large bed. On the edge of very large bed was a very skinny girl
That made me unfreeze and I turned away
Ari!"" Daxton voice carried down the hallway and I panicked
He growled as people got in his way as he tried to make it to the elevator before the doors closed. I breathed a sigh of relief as the elevator went down. Not many people got on as it went down
Arielle!"" I turned and gasped when I saw Daxton running at full speed towards me. He actually came after me? I didn't stop to think about that because I sped walked out the doors and kept walking
A hand grabbed my shoulder and I turned
No."" His eyes challenged me to protest and I sighed with defeat. ""Why did you leave?"" A pang shot through my chest at that question.
Why did I leave? Did you really want me to stay there while you banged some whore?!"" I yelled
No! Don't try and explain yourself! I'm tired of these games you like to play. Make me feel like you actually feel something for me one day
Maybe it's these hormones but I'm tired of walking in on people fucking each other! Especially you
You're such an asshole."" I sobbed and I felt him sigh.
64698;"I was shocked at the fact that he was kissing me. I was about to start enjoying it when I realized he had just come from having sex with that whore.
I wanna make sure our baby doesn't have any siblings popping out anytime soon."" He groaned and ran his hand down his face.
Does it look like I'm having sex anytime soon?"" He didn't answer me
That's perfect. I'll see you then."" He was about to walk away
How kind of you."" I mocked
Excuse me miss?"" I stopped humming and looked up
This gentleman here wants you to come up to the front."" I lifted my eyebrows
Jeremy?"" I whispered not believing it was him. He had moved about five years ago with his dad because he was always in so much trouble.
Jeremy."" I breathed again. ""W-what are you doing here? I thought you moved."" I said
But enough about me. What about you
My mouth opened and closed. ""I-I thought you moved away and I didn't think you shared my feelings
I was scared. You were a wild boy
What was that for?"" I breathed softly. He grinned slyly.
How does tomorrow sound? At noon?"" He ignored my question and I shook my head
Sounds great."" He kissed my cheek this time before sliding out the booth and disappearing out the door. I slumped back
Daxton wanted to meet me at noon tomorrow.....and so did Jeremy. I groaned and hoped that one of them came earlier than the other. If not
64699;"She craves for riches. Silver and gold. A million dollars at her disposal. A great big mansion
He wants power. A feeling of superiority. Absolute authority. Subordinates at his beck and call. Everything is under his control. He is the king. Master of all.
You didn't wake me up! I was supposed to tell Daxton that I couldn't meet with him today."" I hurried to my bathroom and stripped off my clothes
Shut up."" I mumbled. She laughed and turned to leave.
My eyes raked down his body
See something you like?"" He asked
I opened the door and forced a smile on my face.
Jeremy! Hey! I wasn't...expecting you here."" I emphasized here. He smiled at me and my heart sped up a bit. Jesus
I decided to surprise you. I didn't want you driving
Aww thank you so much! You didn't have to."" He looked down at me
Of course I did. You deserve-""
So you plan something knowing we needed to talk? I bet you brought him over to fuck."" Daxton spit out. I gasped at his accusation.
Save it. Deal's over. I'll fuck who I wanna fuck since you think you can do the same thing."" He brushed past me
Ari.."" He engulfed me into a hug and I accepted his embrace. I needed someone to just hold me right now. ""I won't ever leave you
Yes way! I almost fell off the cliff doing that too."" Jeremy explained
So what other place did you visit?"" I asked

Sorry. Hold on."" I picked up my phone and answered without looking at the caller ID. ""Hello?"" Heavy breathing fill my ear and I frowned. ""Who is this?"" The person hung up and I looked at my phone. That was weird. I shrugged and tossed my phone beside me.
Do you know who that was?"" Jeremy asked
He kept quiet and started to lean forward. I blushed when I realized what he was about to do
Arielle! You need to get here now!"" Rayna's panicked voice filled my ear.
He got into an accident and he's in the hospital!"" I gasped
Ari? Ari! You there?"" Rayna yelled through the phone.
What if there's nothing the doctor's can do? What if he stays in the coma forever? What if he dies?!"" I asked freaking out. I pulled at my hair
Do it for your baby boy
Who's in the hospital?"" He asked.
Daxton King's room."" I said to the receptionist. She eyed me warily.
And you are?"" She glanced down at my belly.
His fiancé. Now what's his room number?""
I'm the mother of his unborn child
241."" I stopped my ranting when a doctor came behind her. He frowned at her. ""Next time a pregnant woman comes around asking for her fiancé's room number
I groaned and opened my eyes. I recognized that sound. I looked around
Oh no you don't."" I looked up to see Rayna taking my hand away from the IV that was stuck in my arm.
But I have to go see Daxton."" I whined
You fainted last time you saw Daxton. The nurse wants you to take it easy
I need to see him."" I put on my sad face and hoped it worked. Rayna's face dropped and she huffed before looking around.
Ray stuck her head out the door first
I'll leave you two alone."" Ray whispered. I nodded
The thought made tears leak out my eyes and I quickly wiped them away. I couldn't cry over him
Rapid beeping shocked me out of my thoughts my heart quickened. Nurses and doctor poured in
His heart rate is dropping!"" One yelled. I got up from the chair
Get her out of here!"" A doctor ordered.

No! I wanna know what's going on!"" I yanked my arm out of one of the nurses hold and she hesitated. She knew that roughing me up would not be the smartest thing to do since I could press charges and I'm pregnant. I tried to peek around the white coats to see Daxton
The main doctor walked my way
What's happening to him?"" I whispered. He looked at the nurse before looking back at me.
His heart stopped. We're trying out best to revive him."" I gasped
Arielle! Calm down!"" Jeremy's voice filled my ear.
He's going to die! He can't die! I can't be a single mother! I'll kill him if he dies! He can't-"" Sobs overtook my body and I grabbed the front of Jeremy's shirt
I sat down in a chair outside the room and put both hands on my belly. I down at the floor
I stayed in that position all night and into the morning
Mrs. King?"" The doctor called out. Who's Mrs. King? I raised my eyes to see that he was looking straight at me
Yes?"" My voice was hoarse from the nonstop crying and I could feel that my eyes were still puffy and red. He smiled hesitantly at me

We have some good news."" I perked up. Good news? ""Daxton woke up early this morning and-"" I didn't wait for him to finish. I walked as fast as I could to Daxton's room and flung the door open. There he was
Ari...can't breathe...ow.."" His voice was strained and I quickly let him go
Sorry."" He smiled and I sat down
Why wouldn't I be?"" I asked. He looked away before answering.
I'm such an asshole to you
Could I give him another chance? Should I? What if he breaks my heart again? I ignored the voice inside of me and decided to give him another chance.

Okay."" I whispered. I grabbed his hand and he squeezed it and brought it to his lips. Tingles went down my body and I blushed lightly and looked away. I looked towards the door and saw Jeremy frowning. He looked and me and shook his head
What's he doing here?"" Daxton didn't sound too happy with the fact that a guy he couldn't stand was in his hospital room.
You seemed to have made a remarkable recovery
Thank you sir. I'm sure it was all because of your wonderful staff. So
You won't be going to work anytime soon. You have three broken ribs and they all need proper healing. Do you have anybody that can take care of you around the clock? If not
I'll take care of him."" My mouth moved before my brain could process what I just said. Everyone looked at me
I don't have a problem doing it. Plus
Great! We have to run few more tests
I'm glad she volunteered because I do not want to be the one to help out get dressed."" Dax scowled as Marco laughed. ""I'll be dealing with your paperwork and stuff at work
Good. I'll make sure I give you a raise when I get back."" Marco pumped his fists in the air. ""Ari
Everyone thinks we're engaged anyway and you can't keep driving back and forth so you might as well come stay with me.""
I agree."" Rayna said and Marco nodded.
What the hell did I just get myself into?"
Shut up and just be happy that you own my house now."" I muttered. ""You're welcome."" Rayna huffed and skipped over to where I was sitting.

Thank you so much best friend in the whole wide world. I promise not to christen most of the rooms in the house with Marco."" I almost puked in my mouth at her words. She laughed loudly at my facial expression.
Did you break up with him?"" I asked
Fuck!"" I smiled when I heard Daxton's voice and slid off the stool. Ray followed me outside

Ha ha. Real funny. You won't be laughing when I run you over with this wheelchair."" He threatened and that made me laugh even harder. I felt the baby kick when he heard his dad's words and it warmed my heart.
Marco's laugh rang through the house at my words and Daxton's red face was priceless. ""I think it's time for us to leave."" He chuckled
Ari!"" Daxton shouted behind me and I ignored him
When I got to the room
I leaned back and closed my eyes
Daxton! Get out!"" I yelled. He raised his eyebrows at my demand and kneeled down next to the tub.

I looked in his eyes and his green ones smoldered with desire. ""What are you doing?"" I whispered when his hand began to rub circles on my belly. Liquid heat shot straight to my core when his hand went lower
He chuckled softly and leaned forward
One of his hands held the back of my head and the other slipped two fingers between my folds. I gasped and clamped around his fingers.
Feel better?"" Daxton asked from his spot on the bed.
I'm sleeping in a guest room. Don't bother following me."" I called out behind me
64703;"A month and a half passed and I'm closer to my due date. Living with Daxton is literally a pain in the ass
I sighed and sat down slowly
I thought for a while and one popped into my head. ""What about Dale? You know
Fine. Dale can be his middle name
Good enough for me. Axel Dale King. Sounds good. Do you like that?"" I asked
It's perfect."" He whispered and leaned down

My dad does."" Daxton shook his head at the thought. "" I don't even know why he called everyone in. It's not even on the schedule for this month."" He straightened his tie and I walked with him to the front door.
He's not usually out this late."" I muttered nuder my breath. Just then
Dax: Come outside. I have a surprise for you.
I smiled widely and walked to the front door
Looking for somebody?"" A gravelly voice asked from behind me. I froze
Somewhere you'll never find him."" I moved to turn around to see the guys face
64704;"Pain resonated through my head and I groaned
The one and only. How ya feeling?"" He asked
W-why am I here? Why did you kidnap me?""
So why didn't you take Ray? Why take me?"" I whispered
You have money. Your fiancé has money. Lots and lots of money that I need to pay off my debt to the mafia."" I scrunched up my eyebrows at his testimony.
So you kidnap me?! I'm pregnant
I was afraid you would say that."" He swung something and knocked me out for the second time.
Wha-- where am I?"" I asked
You're in the house. Now where's the money?"" I was so confused as to why he thought I had money with me.

Money? What money? I don't know what you're talking about."" A smack rang out and I realized the man smacked me. I gasped as tears sprang to my eyes from the pain. I felt my baby kick and I started to get scared
Sam told us you had the money and we want our goddamn money
Put the gun down or I'll slit her throat."" The man holding me threatened. Tears flowed down my face as my heart pounded mercilessly from the predicament I was in. Daxton hesitated
Daxton took the machine and started typing quickly. He must of tried to contact someone because the gunman smashed the butt of the gun against Daxton's skull.
Move again and you die. I'll make sure to stab your precious belly first."" I gasped repeatedly
What the hell was that?!"" One yelled. The door burst open and gunshots came from the new-comer
Get down! Get down!"" Yells were tossed and it was obvious they were not prepared for this.
Fuck this!"" The man holding me yelled and pushed me forward. I was caught off guard and tripped over a box that was in front of me.

Arielle! No!"" Daxton's scream seemed to slow down and everything seemed to be going in slow motion. I knew I wouldn't be able to catch myself and there was nothing I could do but to keep falling. Forward. Closer to the ground. When I made contact with the ground
Sounds flowed back into my ears
Listen to me!"" I rasped. ""The baby is coming."" His reaction was all I needed.
Footsteps thundered against the floorboards and bags dropped.
Scratch that. Woman in labor with abdominal bleeding. We need to get her to the hospital now before she bleeds out. Two lives are in danger right now."" He said into the comms.
After I was strapped onto the gurney
64705;"Why is it that whenever I come to from passing out
I opened my eyes and white everything blinded me. White walls
She's coming to. She should be pushing the baby out anytime now."" A nurse said. I turned my head towards her
I'm here."" A contraction hit me and I gasped. It hit me again and I gritted my teeth
Agghhhh!"" I screamed out as I pushed against another contraction.
Would you like to cut the cord?"" The nurse asked Daxton. He nodded
He's so beautiful."" I whispered as he was placed in my arms.
What's his name?"" The nurse asked us.
He's perfect."" He leaned forward and kissed my forehead. My eyes closed for a second before opening again. ""Tired?"" He asked. I nodded
Nine months passed and things were fine for a while. I had to stay in the hospital for a month after having Axel because of the bruising in my abdominal area

The paparazzi and magazines were going crazy when they saw Axel and we even did an entire family photoshoot for a 10-pafe spread to welcome Axel into the King family. It seemed as if the entire world was just as excited as we were. They interviewed us and even asked if we were going to have another kid. Not anytime soon if I get my way.
Daxton was a terrific father and he did everything in his power to be the best dad to Axel. He fed him
Just take him with you."" Daxton said blatantly. I frowned and walked to his desk.
Doesn't matter."" He continued. I groaned and threw my hands up.
No."" He said finally. Hurt must have been etched into my features because his face softened before it hardened again.
Fine. Bastard."" I spit out and stormed out of his office. I walked to our room
He smiled and waved his arms
Since your dad is being an as--annoying
We need to talk."" His deep voice rang out and anticipation littered through my spine.
Uh...I don't know how to start this."" He looked up at the ceiling
Jeremy was behind the entire thing."" My mouth fell open and many different emotions ran through me
I don't know. Maybe you're jealous of the attention he gave me."" I shot
Jealous? Why would I be jealous when I've gotten what I wanted? I have you and he doesn't. Simple as that.""
I'm not a possession."" I ground out

Nothing. I need to work. Take Axel with you because I'm not watching him."" He left without another word. My mouth seemed to be off it's hinges because it stayed open at his words. Why was he so moody all of a sudden? I couldn't think of one think that I've done to deserve this treatment.
Already in my work out clothes
I was walking out the building with Axel when I bumped into someone. ""Oh
It's okay--Ari?"" I looked at the man in front of me and smiled.
Jeremy! Hi! I feel like I haven't seen you in forever."" He smiled at me
Same. I'm thinking of moving again
You too."" I watched as he went into the gym and I turned back to go to my car. the drive home was silent
Seriously..."" I mumbled to myself. I pulled out my phone and called him. ""This better be a joke."" After ringing for a while
We're sorry. The number you have called has been disconnected. Please call your service provider for any questions you might have. For more options press--
I ended the call and squeezed my phone
By the time I read this much

You were kidnapped because of bad business that occurred between me and other people that I will not name. The less you know the better. you can be as angry as you want with me as long as you're safe. I've cut all contact with you and any other people that might know you
64707;"""Mommy!"" Axel ran out his grandparents house and towards my outstretched arms. I scooped him up
Yes! We baked cookies and a BIG cake--"" He opened his arms wide when he said big. ""--and we read a lot of books."" Axel explained
He behaved himself very well. Reminds me of Daxton at that age."" Mrs. King came out with an apron on. I smiled through the pain that squeezed my chest. Ever since Axel was born
I drove off to our house and grabbed his book bag before opening the front door. Axel zoomed in
It's okay. Just remember next time.""
I have to show you the picture I drew in class."" Axel grabbed my hand and dragged me into the kitchen. I chuckled and let him lead me.
Very important. We had to draw family pictures and mine was the best! Miss. Johnson even said so herself."" He said proudly
It's Daxton! My daddy!"" He said excitedly. My heart clenched and just the mention of his name made me want to go and cry forever in my room.
You said his eyes were really green so I used the greenest green ever!"" Axel frowned suddenly. ""When do I get to meet my daddy? All the other kids have daddies and I don't."" He pouted.
Mmmmm vis ish foohhhh goooo."" Axel said with a mouthful of food.
Axel made sure to swallow his food before answering. ""Fruit punch!"" He took another big bite of his food
Oh no you don't!"" I yelled
Mommy! You caught me!"" He screamed with delight.
Sure did!"" I blew on his belly and jumped on the large bed with him in my arms. He was laughing so hard
I can do that too. Watch."" Axel jumped off the bed and started mocking me.
Last one to brush their teeth is a rotten egg."" I said
No fair! You got a head start!"" Axel whined padding behind me into the bathroom.
Wanna know who I'm gonna dream about tonight?"" He asked softly.
No. I'm gonna dream of daddy."""

I heard the bell ring and I watched as little kids filed out of the elementary prep school. I could see that uniforms were mandatory because every kid that walked out of there wore the same thing. My eyes scanned the grass area
His hair was dark and long
I always maintained contact with my parents and told them not to tell Arielle. I closed my eyes
Are you gonna move?"" He asked
Are you always this rude?"" I asked
My mommy says to not talk to strangers. So move
Only if you give me your name too. And then move."" He bargained. Smart boy.
Deal."" I extended my hand and he shook it firmly.
My name is Axel. What's yours?""
Daxton. My name is Daxton."" Axel's eyes widened.
That's my daddy's name!"" He said excitedly. He looked me up and down
Your eyes are so green. Just like my drawing!"" This kid was a happy one.
I chuckled and wrapped my arms around him
Wait."" He pulled away slightly. ""What's my mommy's name? Her whole name? Mommy said you're the only person in the world
Arielle Nalani Renata Dabria Fortunato."" The Italian name flowed smoothly off my tongue and Axel's jaw dropped.
You are my daddy!"" He wrapped his arms around me again and tears sprang to my eyes. This was all I needed.
When I got home from work
Mommy! I found Daddy!"" I heard Axel's voice and I frowned. He wasn't supposed to be home yet. I sighed when I comprehended what he said. He always tried to find a man that looked like his father.
Daxton looked a bit uncomfortable and I couldn't stop the reaction I had towards him

He was in one of his tailor made Armani suits and I just wanted to run my hands down his muscular arms. But then I snapped out of my stupor and pain from his sudden appearance resonated throughout my body. I had to reach deeply
Arielle."" His deep voice called out.
Sure. Why don't you go and put your things up while I speak to your father
Axel ran towards me and nodded

Bullshit! You had four years to see us and you come now? Now??"" My voice got higher as I got frustrated. ""You left us Daxton. Axel wasn't even old enough to remember you and now you wanna swoop in and play dad? That's not gonna work with me.""
Don't give me that load of crap
Daxton rubbed my back and leaned his chin on the top of my head.
64709;"My heart almost stops as I take in the utter disaster before me.
Flames leap out of the wreckage.
A scream breaks through the noise.
A woman pulled out of the crash--
She doesn't try to escape the flames;
She tries to dive back in.
Repeating a name like an anthem
A police officer is holding her back
Firefighters work to put out he flames
The firefighter reaches into the burned and warped metal.
A young child--a girl.  No more than 4 years old.
Not a single scratch.  Not a single burn.
Only blue eyes wide and calm as she reaches out for her mother.
The crowd gathered can only gasp in shock
Standing on that sidewalk in the face of a disaster
The desire overwhelming and overpowering me.
As I walk by the glass window
I smile as I close my eyes
64712;"""Mommy."" I sniffed and wiped my face before turning to face Axel.
Why are you crying?"" His face scrunched up
Why was he here? Out of the blue
I'm fine. What do you need?"" I sucked in a breath and calmed myself down as much as I could. Green eyes looked at me hesitantly
Same place you kept your tools."" I told him
Are you and daddy gonna get married now
I don't know."" I finally answered. Axel didn't say anything after that
Arielle."" I screamed and covered my chest with my shirt as Daxton came into view.
What are you doing in here? Get out!"" I pointed to the door and walked backwards and around him as he came closer.
I'm sure you'll manage without one. Now leave."" I pointed to the door again
If that's what you want."" I didn't answer him because I was afraid my voice would crack again.
I closed my eyes and waited for him to leave
The sun hit my eyes and I groaned
Shit! Axel's gonna be late for school."" I ran out my room and burst into Axel's room. He wasn't there

I took him to school."" I skidded to a halt when Daxton appeared from the kitchen. I lost my ability to breathe when I saw that he didn't have a shirt on. His washboard abs and deep v-line called my name. His long hair was ruffled as if he just woke up.
Why the hell would you do that?!"" I yelled
I never said you couldn't do it. You were sleeping so peacefully
Axel is not a buden."" I said darkly
I didn't mean that--"" He sputtered

Save it. Don't think that you can come in here after four years and swoop in to be the perfect dad. It doesn't work like that."" I walked past him and into the kitchen to find something to eat. I heard his footsteps behind me as he followed.
How about I tell you why I left."" I opened my mouth to answer smartly
64713;"""I left because you and Axel's lives were in danger. Because of me."" Daxton explained.
Okay. And you couldn't tell me that? I am--was your fiancé and you couldn't explain this to me?"" I argued
Ari--"" Daxton started but I interrupted him.
How do I know you're telling the truth?"" I asked
You didn't think Sam was capable of something like kidnapping you
They said that if I didn't leave you and Axel
Oh my god...."" I whispered to myself.
I know."" He answered. I shook my head.

Are you crazy?! I'm not gonna sit here and speculate when our son could be in danger!"" I moved past him and ran out the front door and into my car. I didn't care if Daxton followed or not. I just needed to get to Axel. I drove as fast as I could to Axel's school
That little boy had dark hair and the man was whispering something to him. The little boy frowned and tried to yank his hand out of the man's larger one
No! Let me go! Help!"" The little boy screamed.
Fists flew and Axel scrambled away from the two men and ran towards me. I ran and fell to the grass hugging him tightly.
Hey! Is your kid okay?"" The stranger jogged over
Nothing? I almost lost my son and you say that's nothing?"" I looked at his hands. ""You even bruised yourself."" He chuckled and looked at his hands for a second before looking back at me.
Thank you for saving me Mister."" He held out his tiny hand and the man smiled back
Michael. Michael Ginobli."" Michael answered. I smiled at the exchange.
I'm Axel and this is my mommy

64739;"We were just across the street when it happened. I mean

It was a Spanish speaking CPR class that I was running. I was a paramedic. An EMT and this was my first job. I was helping Dan pass out the fake dummies when Officer Connelly came in. We had just finished a break.
Excuse me class. Umm...we will be right back. Come on Beach

We get outside and Dan turns to Connelly as we are running towards the apartment complex. ""What the hell was that man? You can't be like that when I'm telling these people they need to be calm in emergency situations. Like what the hell man?!""
It was easy to find because the mom ran out to us and grabbed me with her bloody hands.
Help my baby! HELP HIM! HE IS MY ONLY SON! I just tried to help. I just tried to help. I can't believe my husband left those screws laying around. SAVE HIM!!""
On the floor of the living room we found patches of blood and the baby snorted. The screw he had tried to swallow was now sticking out of his upper chest.
She tried to pull it out didn't she?"" I said.
No. But we have to try rescuing him even if he isn't breathing.""

64743;"       His village ran out of food. The cropgods - for whatever reason - were angry. The village had relied upon farming for a handful of generations now. So it was either starve or find a way not to starve. He thus recruited other men in the village to ask a neighboring village for food.
This village could not afford to help them - so they raided it. The hunger and fear had been driving them mad
So he created a last name
A black cat black as pitch
—remember those nights in Surgut against Slavic!
A long way down the street
A faint light gleams amid a dead dusky town
A maiden with a long white robe
Cries the gong at the cathedral
Her shrill voice hissing like the rain
Subduing the pain beneath his veins
Her breath clasping firmly on his own
Like brass rods rimed with mottled rust
Her dark-side runs across his warmth
He reaches out to her falling flesh
An image that flames his flesh
He smells her skin and hair
He roams the length of the room
Hurling imprecations at his own shadow
Unable to make sense of himself
Watching him run from light to night
She watches him run from himself
He leaps forth declaring his love to a ghoul
And in her arms he endeavors to crush
